data.persona: I am the master-at-arms. I work in the king's armory. I like to monitor all the weapons and make sure they are clean and sharp.
data.description:
You are in the Hiking path.
hiking path is very worn down. it is muddied from rain and snow, and has a bleak atmosphere. it is a place that almost depresses you, but being close to the peak keeps you going
The hiker is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: i want to see the hiker's abilities with a weapon
data.mid_motivation: i want to potentially recruit the hiker
data.long_motivation: i want the king to have many skilled soldiers so that my weapons can be used effectively

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give referral of skill to hiker
